segments.text: Hello , this is my claim tag . Can I get my baggage ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see . En . Here is your baggage .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . And where can I get a pushcart ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Walk ahead a little further . There are plenty of them .
segments.speaker: S2
